website_summaries.verdict: A top-of-the-line model with great versatility and an exceptional feature set.
pros: This unit can fully charge a 12-volt battery in under 12 hours
It has an 8-step charging program that can revive, charge, and maintain voltage levels
Safety measures include spark resistance, reverse polarity protection, and being short circuit-proof
cons: The price is a bit steep, but this charger is fantastic

customer_reviews.title: Danger Danger
customer_reviews.text: Although the CTEK product functioned as advertised while charging a battery, the device reached temperatures above 70 degrees centigrade (measured using laser tec4). As a result, I do not believe this device can be safely operated by ordinary people.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph

customer_reviews.title: Completely trust this charger!
customer_reviews.text: Love the complete tests and charging capabilities of this device. I use a 36Ah battery for camping and this CTEK MUS 4.3 Polar does the trick. The cold weather model does indeed have flexible cables which stay flexible - they feel like 8mm plug wires. I've used it in 5 degree F weather with ease. CTEK recommends 20Ah as a line of delineation between small battery charge rate and larger ones, so I use the car (large) setting. Also, can choose between standard lead-acid and AGMrates, mine being AGM. Great.
customer_reviews.author: Willie B.

customer_reviews.title: Polar conditions - no problem.
customer_reviews.text: I recently left my car in an unheated Minnesota garage for 4 months during one of the coldest fall/winter months (November - February) of the last 20 years. It was still -5 when I started the car - vroom, flawless. It’s a charger that lives up to its claims of being a polar charger. Well worth a few extra dollars.
customer_reviews.author: Claudia

customer_reviews.title: Great Charger!
customer_reviews.text: I got this charge because I loved how well my other CTEK worked on my other optima red top battery. I use this one between two cars that I keep outside because it is weather rated. One has a optima red top the other an Interstate. I don't drive them during the winter months and now I don't have to go out to start them up that often any more. That will save me on that non ethanol gas prices. I will probably get another on so I don't have to switch it between the two.
customer_reviews.author: Brian W.

customer_reviews.title: Pricey but great safe charger
customer_reviews.text: Best battery charger I’ve had yet and I have had quite a few. This one I feel I can trust not to overcharge my battery. Using my Fluke meter, voltage is spot on with there specs. Only gripe is all cable stay flexible when cold except the pigtails that attaches to the battery. For the price they need to use the same flexible wire for the battery pigtails as they use for the rest of it. Have to watch where you set the unit while in use as it can get rather hot, don’t set on anything plastic or painted. Overall definitely would buy again even with its small flaws I really like it.
customer_reviews.author: REG

customer_reviews.title: Perfect little charger for AGM batteries
customer_reviews.text: Great charger. Will bring up fully flat agm batteries that very few chargers even recognize and most indicate as being faulty. Low temp operation is great. Also, it is waterproof, which will be great in snow and ice. Update: Have been using this charger for a few years now. Batteries are all still going strong vs used to have to replace every 2-3 years. Pays for itself in battery change savings. Sits on car all winter long and battery is good as new in spring. I did destroy one when I dropped it, so I've since purchased the bumper accessory to protect them.
customer_reviews.author: engineer

customer_reviews.title: I agree with all other 5 stars reviews
customer_reviews.text: I agree with all other 5 star reviewers. Little note that makes no difference, when reconditioning mode is used, depending on the car you drive, in my case BMW sedan, the computer does not understand the battery charge drop and may shut off some of the electronics like gps tracker plugged in the obd2 port (if you have one) granted that most people may not have one. It may also shut off other components that may be on stand by. It seems to me it does not cause any harm but you be the judge of it depending on the kind of gadget you may believe you need on 24/7.
customer_reviews.author: HPH

customer_reviews.title: Itest battery charger/ reconditioner ever made.
customer_reviews.text: My old car battery died last winter. A coworker helped me out with his oldschool charger and so I decided to buy a used one on craigslist. Boy am I glad craigslist didn't have any for sale I'm my area. I ended up researching chargers that night and ended up buying this one. When it arrived I disconnected my battery and set the charger to recondition. It's January almost a year later and that old battery is still kicking my engine over like a champ! So just buy it its awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: This is my 2nd CTEK. My first is the non-polar MUS 4.3. Both work beautifully. Easy to use. I really like the charge progress lights. I use the first on my BMW K1600 GTL motorcycle. I bought this one to keep my Porsche Macan charged during this pandemic, as I'm not driving much (the joke about getting 3 weeks to the gallon applies!). I bought the accessory kit for the first one, which has a cigarette lighter plug adapter - works great for the car. No need to use alligator clamps on the battery. Just turn on the ignition power of the car, insert the adapter into the cigarette lighter, plug in the ctek, turn off ignition, car stays charged.
customer_reviews.author: Brado

customer_reviews.title: Stops charging before battery is fully charged
customer_reviews.text: I like the fact that the charger is rated as being able to operate in cold temperatures. I dislike the fact that the battery has yet to be fully charged during the winter by this charger (while in my garage at an average temperature of 40 degrees or higher). The instructions indicate that the car can be started with a reading at the halfway point. At the completion reading, if the charger is unplugged and plugged in again, after achieving the #4 level, the charger then indicates that the battery has only been charged up to the halfway point. This information is confirmed by a "replace battery" reading of my battery tester!
customer_reviews.author: celica

customer_reviews.title: Works as promised. I'd like more thorough instructions.
customer_reviews.text: The charger is very easy to use. I'm not sure exactly what makes it an extreme climate version. There is a mention of the AC cord being flexible to lower temperatures. I'm using it in an unheated garage and the temps can get to -15F if we get super cold weather. So far, it's not been that cold. The charger seems to be working perfectly. I've had it in service for about two months.
customer_reviews.author: T. C. Furlong

customer_reviews.title: Nice charger, but not a miracle cure
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because my older Everstart unit died and I was hopeful this would help me with a battery for my Watchdog sump pump backup unit. I have tried it for several days and it continues to get an error message. The unit itself is nice quality and has worked well on my other batteries, but this will not "Fix" a bad battery. At least mine. For the price, features and quality, I would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: NollCraft

customer_reviews.title: Working great in -28F weather.
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. I had to store my car outside for two months. The temps during the first few weeks were down to -28 degrees Fahrenheit. The cables were still flexible and it ran my battery through the full cycle and is keeping it charged. Time will tell. I still have another month of storage to go, but the battery readings look good.
customer_reviews.author: Neil

customer_reviews.title: Awesome, don't bother with other brands.
customer_reviews.text: Love this thing. Hook it up and relax. It will take care of everything. I have a lighter adapter hardwired to the battery in my trunk and plug in there. Works great in even subzero garage Temps for me. Nice having the lights to tell what it is doing at the moment too. Jay Leno was right on this one.
customer_reviews.author: The74impala

customer_reviews.title: It's a tender!!
customer_reviews.text: I just started using this so I can't talk to the longevity or how it will maintain the battery but I got it to tend my car battery while in winter storage. It comes with multiple ways to hook it to the battery and is pretry straight forward and easy to use and get started with. The instruction manual explains what each section on the display is going has a safe disco next bracket and seems to be a well made good product we will see in late April after about 5 months without a startup.
customer_reviews.author: Jillian Goodfellow

customer_reviews.title: A must have.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for 08 535i. These cars are notorious for discharging batteries. I make frequent short trips so the battery receives very little recharge. I plug it in over the weekend and within a day battery is at full charge.
customer_reviews.author: J and V

customer_reviews.title: CTEK vehicle chargers
customer_reviews.text: I have three CTEK chargers and all three work perfectly!!
customer_reviews.author: Twinturbomb13

customer_reviews.title: Flexible cords are so much better in the cold
customer_reviews.text: I own a couple other CTEK chargers that I have had great results with as battery chargers but found the cords to be somewhat of a challenge when Michigan winter rolls around. The normal cords are fine where it's warmer but loose flexibility at the temperatures drop. On the Polar charger, the cords still work great even with temps around 0 F. That this charger is more powerful and charges quicker than the other CTEKS I own is just a bonus.
customer_reviews.author: B Buehler

customer_reviews.title: Makes all the difference
customer_reviews.text: This charge is awesome. It kept the battery on my tractor topped off and warm all winter. I live in Maine and during past winters once or twice a week I would have to jump start the tractor due to the cold weather, and i would have to replace the battery every year. Once I installed this charger I haven't had any issues and the batter is just like new. i really like the Quick disconnect which I have wired to the tractor.
customer_reviews.author: gooddad

customer_reviews.title: Versatile
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be a super little charger. Very versatile. Only con I have found is that it should have come with the standard SAE connector. Would save ~$10 for not having to buy the SAE adapter.
customer_reviews.author: DMDinNCMn

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: Uses connectors that are different than others but easy to use. I reconditioned a battery I thought was no good. I like how it works. FYI, it comes with the "alligator" clips as well as the bolt on type.
customer_reviews.author: 10thmountainman

customer_reviews.title: The best trickle charger and battery restorer for maintaining classic cars!
customer_reviews.text: Very high quality units at a fair price. Classic and specialty cars, but their nature often spend lots of time in the garage, not being driven regularly. It's critical to keep them on a high quality trickle charger so the battery does not die between drives. CTEK makes one of the best!!!
customer_reviews.author: rwilkoff

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding Charger For Proper Battery Maintenance
customer_reviews.text: This battery maintenance charger is in a league of its own. Very pleased with how well it performs and the excellent quality of it. Outstanding product and much thought must have gone into its design! Impressive!
customer_reviews.author: Research B4Buy

customer_reviews.title: very useful
customer_reviews.text: excellent, needed for AGM, yet life time too short, had 4 units die after a few years
customer_reviews.author: candidcurt

customer_reviews.title: Harley Battery Lasted 9 Years.
customer_reviews.text: this is only the Second CTek I've Purchased in 10 Years! this first is still working great on my Harley, this one I bought because my wife's Harley came with a Battery Tender and in ten Years, she's' purchased 3 Harley Tenders and 4 batteries. I only replaced my Battery after 9 years! Hopefully this will reduce her Cost on Batteries Too!
customer_reviews.author: Thomas M.

customer_reviews.title: awesome battery charger
customer_reviews.text: fully automatic, can recondition mostly dead batteries, not a miracle worker, but close. small. compact and lite-weight, easy to use. nothing negative to report.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: It appears to do what it says.
customer_reviews.text: Sp far so good. I bought an adapter to be able to utilize the existing tender hookups I already had installed..... So far the unit does exactly what it says it will... I've conditioned 3 small batteries and one automotive battery.
customer_reviews.author: Inspector857

customer_reviews.title: Don’t fall for the pretty orange color
customer_reviews.text: With barely any use, the coating is noticeably chipping. It takes a long time go through it’s paces even after a battery was just charged. My SOLAR and older Battery Tender Plus are WAY better units. Mr. Leno was duped and so was I...
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Warner

customer_reviews.title: Very durable
customer_reviews.text: Charger works well. I left it plugged in to my car and drove off. I came back to my charger in the middle of the road obviously having been run over. Charger still works. The case is definitely worse for wear but I am impressed.
customer_reviews.author: deyluv.natalie

customer_reviews.title: It is appropriate for many vehicle types
customer_reviews.text: This is a great charger. With its many modes and low current charging, it is appropriate for many long term charging from motorcycles, to ATV and snowmobiles, to cars and trucks. I highly recommend this product for vehicles that are not run at least once a week.
customer_reviews.author: Matt H.

customer_reviews.title: Works as it should
customer_reviews.text: Keeps my Ducati Diavel charged when not riding it. Have had this for several months and there have been no problems.
customer_reviews.author: AJ 1972

customer_reviews.title: Why did I wait so long- fantastic product.
customer_reviews.text: Always thought it was my battery not my charger as I abuse vehicles by short trips and long storage periods (motorcycle). Extremely pleased with the function and quality of this unti. Don't hesitate- get one today.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Mrugacz

customer_reviews.title: Quality Product
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use,good quality, keeps my car battery fully charged. Very happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Spooky

customer_reviews.title: Seems to work well
customer_reviews.text: This CTEK device appears to work well. I wish I understood better what the different lights tell us, but as far as I can tell, car always starts up robustly after being on this device.
customer_reviews.author: HelpMeHelpU

customer_reviews.title: My batteries act better than new
customer_reviews.text: CTEK products always perform ,this charger is the best one I have owned yet. The color is eye catching, the functions make it super flexible. I charged two of my vehicles the first day, the batteries act better than new.
customer_reviews.author: Troy Boy

customer_reviews.title: Winter use
customer_reviews.text: This trickle charger is ideal for use in cold weather. The wires are encapsulated in a sleek black cold resistant cable. The unit is waterproof and weatherproof!!
customer_reviews.author: Kevin K.

customer_reviews.title: Works really good. The cord for this polar version stayed nice ...
customer_reviews.text: Works really good. The cord for this polar version stayed nice and flexible in very cold temps. The charger also brought back to life a battery that other chargers said was bad and they would not charge. Saved money right there. Will be buying another.
customer_reviews.author: Dana Benson

customer_reviews.title: Impressed
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for our snowmobiles and it pepped both of the batteries right up. We had one of the snowmobiles with an older battery (5 plus years old) on a Battery Tender with no luck on gaining additional cranking power, but the C-Tek Polar has is cranking like new.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great charger great Price point
customer_reviews.text: Works very well used to keep a car charged outside in the winter time quick to disconnect and reconnect
customer_reviews.author: NBSS LLC

customer_reviews.title: I recommend this device
customer_reviews.text: It does exactly what I need it to do.... maintain battery charge. Hooked it up roughly four weeks ago. I check it once a week. It’s small enough to tuck away in engine compartment with hood completely closed. Plugged into a 50ft 10 gauge extension cord continuous use week in week out. So far no flaws
customer_reviews.author: keeperofdeath

customer_reviews.title: I love this charger
customer_reviews.text: My second CTEK charger. Sadly, my old one bit the dust after very little use, but this one was used all through last winter to float charge my Corvette, no problems at all.
customer_reviews.author: Anony Moose

customer_reviews.title: Awesome charger for various sized batteries
customer_reviews.text: Awesome charger! I bought this for my 3 snowmobiles, but have since added charging ports on the tractor, generator, and trailer emergency breakaway battery. It is truly the smartest charger I've ever had and is set it and forget it simple...Highly recommend CTEK.
customer_reviews.author: Steve G.

customer_reviews.title: I bought two!
customer_reviews.text: Have used this for 1 year and liked it so much I bought two!
customer_reviews.author: Walker

customer_reviews.title: Like the various modes from good battery
customer_reviews.text: Prompt delivery & quality product. Like the various modes from good battery, bad battery to reconditioning. Would buy again
customer_reviews.author: HM Jones

customer_reviews.title: It's not working.
customer_reviews.text: It's not working at all waste of my money. Asked for 220-240v electricity put you sent me the 110 and I force my converter.
customer_reviews.author: Ali Fahad AL Khulaifi

customer_reviews.title: CTEK is the best!
customer_reviews.text: CTEK makes the best battery maintainer chargers. This is a great charger and I would not consider any other brand. It will not boil your battery dry as I have experienced with other brands in the past.
customer_reviews.author: J. H.

customer_reviews.title: Still working
customer_reviews.text: No problems, the car started when I removed it and it held the charge when I stored the vehicle.
customer_reviews.author: Antoine Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Better then expected
customer_reviews.text: i have over 8 batteries that need charged in the winter months and these are the best i have found so far in years. simple to install and do the job in freezing weather.
customer_reviews.author: The Frozen Chozen

customer_reviews.title: Works well so far
customer_reviews.text: Seems to work well enough wish the connection to the battery was longer, just long enough to make out from under the seat in my Harley Road King.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Floch

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great this is my 4th one I have bought, love it
customer_reviews.author: ssimmy

customer_reviews.title: Best on the market!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my GTR. Performed great this past winter.
customer_reviews.author: bakbak321

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the cost
customer_reviews.text: Works like a charm and is a charger is a must for flashing your 335i and or storing it during the winter.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not just looks cool also working great
customer_reviews.text: Not just looks cool also working great! If you don't drive your car very often then this is a must-have
customer_reviews.author: Don

customer_reviews.title: Bought this for my 2014 Porsche 911. Same features ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 2014 Porsche 911. Same features and more as the Porsche model only cheaper. I bought the cold weather model because of the Michigan weather.
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: Latest thing in battery care.
customer_reviews.text: I learned about this from Lenno's garage on you tube, this charger is terrific.
customer_reviews.author: Bookster

customer_reviews.title: You Get what you pay for !!
customer_reviews.text: Pleased with its ease of operation, and its ability to perform !
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A High Quality Tool
customer_reviews.text: I've only used it a few times so far, but I love the versatility of these units. The fact that it will handle colder temps is a big plus as well.
customer_reviews.author: Ron Clark

customer_reviews.title: It works fine as a charger
customer_reviews.text: One big disadvantage of this charger is that the DC power cord side is incredibly thick. I bought this to replace a regular CTek charger, which I have running out of the trunk lid of my car. Not possible to do with this one. It works fine as a charger. I am not sure this is worth the extra money over the regular charger.
customer_reviews.author: Glenn Wallace

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great charger maintainer,will only be buying Ctek chargers in the future!!
customer_reviews.author: Millwrightcraig

customer_reviews.title: Great to maintain battery over winter or top off
customer_reviews.text: Keep one In the trunk. Great to maintain battery over winter or top off. Don't expect it will start your car or charge a battery that totally dead (under 3 volts).
customer_reviews.author: John Reed

customer_reviews.title: Why can't America make something like this?
customer_reviews.text: It was made (in china) for cold weather and snow. It's what semi-neglected winter batteries need. The color goes with anything. Tis the high 14.7 voltage model - for Odyssey type AGM batteries.
customer_reviews.author: Mike S.

product_meta.title: CTEK (56-958) MUS 4.3 POLAR 12 Volt Fully Automatic Extreme Climate 8 Step Battery Charger
product_meta.description:
The MUS 4.3 POLAR charger has been specifically developed to offer excellent all around charging. The special cold weather performance and adapted AC and DC cables handle severe cold down to -22 degrees F (-30 degrees C). It is an advanced microprocessor controlled battery charger providing unrivalled performance on batteries from 1.2Ah to 110Ah.

 The MUS 4.3 POLAR charger is loaded with features including diagnosis of battery condition to establish if it can receive and retain a charge, patented automatic de-sulphation program and a special reconditioning function that will revive and restore deeply discharged and stratified batteries. The 'Snowflake' mode ensures ideal charging performance when in the most extreme cold conditions. The patented Float/Pulse maintenance makes the charger ideal for long-term maintenance. The entire process of battery testing, charging and maintenance is easily followed on the clear LED display.

The charger is a fully automatic (connect and forget) 12V charger with 8 charging steps. The RECOND and SNOWFLAKE modes operate individually or together in both 0.8A and 4.3A programs, providing great flexibility for the user. It offers a wide charging range on all lead-acid battery types from 1.2Ah up to 110Ah, with additional maintenance capability to 160Ah.

This charger is splash and dust proof and above all, very easy to use. It also has safety features to prevent sparks and protect against reverse polarity and short circuiting ensuring that you and your vehicles electronics are kept safe. 

The MUS POLAR 4.3 battery charger has a 5 year Limited warranty
feature_bullets: Specially developed for use in extreme cold conditions featuring AC and DC cables adapted to handle severe cold temperatures
Fully automatic 8 step patented program tests battery condition and revives, charges and maintains to ensure maximum battery life and performance
No sparks, short-circuit proof and reverse polarity protected makes it safe for all the vehicles electronics and easy to use
Water and dust resistant means it is safe to use in all climate situations
Numerous accessories simplifies using the same charger for multiple battery applications

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars213 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
